scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Forums_CreateEditPost_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($forum = false) #set($forum = $core_v2_forum.Current) #set ($supportsQuestionThreads = false) #foreach ($threadType in $forum.AllowedThreadTypes) #if ($threadType == 'QuestionAndAnswer') #set($supportsQuestionThreads = true) #end #end #set($threadOrReplyType = 'thread') #set($threadOrReply = false) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = false) #set($replyToThread = false) #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumThread.ContentTypeId) #if($core_v2_forumReply.Current) #set($threadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumReply.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.ModifyPost,"%{PostType='replies',PostId=$threadOrReply.Id}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Get($threadOrReply.ThreadId)) #elseif($core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($threadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.Current) #set($threadOrReplyType = 'thread') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumThread.ContentTypeId) #if(!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.ModifyPost,"%{PostType='threads',PostId=$threadOrReply.Id}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Current) #elseif($core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToType = 'reply') #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumReply.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get("forums", $forum.Id, $core_v2_forumPermissions.CreateReply, "%{PostId=$replyToThreadOrReply.Id, PostType='replies'}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $core_v2_forumThread.Get($replyToThreadOrReply.ThreadId)) #elseif ($core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToType = 'thread') #set($threadOrReplyType = 'reply') #set($contentTypeId = $core_v2_forumReply.ContentTypeId) #if (!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get("forums", $forum.Id, $core_v2_forumPermissions.CreateReply, "%{PostId=$replyToThreadOrReply.Id, PostType='threads'}").IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #set($replyToThread = $replyToThreadOrReply) #elseif(!$core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.CreatePost).IsAllowed) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #if(!$replyToThreadOrReply) #if($core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumReply.CurrentParent) #elseif ($core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #set($replyToThreadOrReply = $core_v2_forumThread.CurrentParent) #end #end #set($uploadUrl = false) #set($uploadUrl = $core_v2_forumUrls.UploadAttachment($forum.Id)) #set($tempData = false) #if ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tsid')) #set($tempDataString = false) #set($tempDataString = $core_v2_utility.GetTemporaryData($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('tsid'))) #if($tempDataString) #set($tempData = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($tempDataString)) #end #end
#if ($threadOrReply)

$threadOrReply.Subject

#elseif ($threadOrReplyType == 'reply')

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('ReplyTo'), $replyToThreadOrReply.Subject)

#elseif ($forum.AllowedThreadTypes.Count > 1)

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewQuestionOrDiscussion'), $forum.Name)

#elseif ($forum.AllowedThreadTypes.get_Item(0) == 'QuestionAndAnswer')

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewQuestion'), $forum.Name)

#else

$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('NewDiscussion'), $forum.Name)

#end
    #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.EnableThreadStatus && $forum.AllowedThreadTypes.Count > 1) #set($threadType = $forum.DefaultThreadType) #set($threadType = $threadOrReply.ThreadType)
    • #end #if ($replyToThreadOrReply)
  • $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_ReplyFormat'), $replyToThreadOrReply.Author.DisplayName, $core_v2_language.FormatDateAndTime($replyToThreadOrReply.Date)) $replyToThreadOrReply.Body('WebQuote') $core_v2_language.GetResource('Button_Quote')
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread')
    • #end
  • #set($body = '') #if($threadOrReply) #set($body = $threadOrReply.Body('raw')) #elseif($tempData) #set($body = $tempData.Value('body')) #end $core_v2_editor.Render('PostBody', "%{Width='100%', Value=$body, ContentTypeId=$contentTypeId}")
    • #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread')
    • #end #if (!$threadOrReply && $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($core_v2_user.Accessing.Id))
    • #end #if ($threadOrReply && $core_v2_forumConfiguration.DisplayEditNotes)
    • #end ## Only show attachment form for threads/replies that already have them #if ($uploadUrl && $!threadOrReply.File && ($core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.AttachFileLocal).IsAllowed || $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.AttachFileRemote).IsAllowed))
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_Attachment') $!threadOrReply.File.FileName #if ($threadOrReply && $threadOrReply.File) $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_UpdateAttachment')#else $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_AddAttachment')#end $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_RemoveAttachment')
    • #end #if ($replyToThreadOrReply) #if($replyToThread && $replyToThread.ThreadType == 'QuestionAndAnswer')
    • #end #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.ReviewAbuse).IsAllowed)
    • #end #if ($threadOrReplyType == 'thread' && $core_v2_nodePermission.Get('forums',$forum.Id,$core_v2_forumPermissions.PinPost).IsAllowed) #set($daysFromToday = 0) #set($daysFromToday = $threadOrReply.StickyDate.Date.Subtract($core_v2_utility.CurrentDate.Date).TotalDays) #if(!$threadOrReply.IsSticky) #set($daysFromToday = 0) #end
    • #end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CreateEditPost_PostButton')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.createEditPost') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Forums_CreateEditPost_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="showForumInHeader" resourceName="CF_ShowForumInHeader" dataType="bool" defaultValue="false" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Creates or edits a blog post.
character(s) over the recomended length. For best results this should shortened.
When selecting text to quote, only text from the original post can be selected. Please correct or remove your text selection.
This field is required and quote blocks must match.
An error occurred while attempting to save this post.
Prioritize at the top of lists
Notify me when someone replies to this post
Are you sure you want to delete this post?
Your draft has been saved. To edit or publish it later, manage the blog and find the post in the posts list.
Creates or finds an existing question thread
Creates or edits a forum post.
Comma-separated list of words that uniquely relate to this content. These can be used by search engines to improve search results.
Adjust the title used by search engines when referencing this content. If not set, the blog post’s name will be used. For best results custom titles should be 55 characters or less.
Ask a Question or Start a Discussion in {0}
Post this entry on my other blogs
Notify me when someone comments on this post

Post summaries are used when displaying posts in lists or RSS feeds. Additionally this summary is exposed to search engines and facebook. For best results, custom summaries should be 155 characters or less.
This image will be used as a thumbnail in blog post list view and as the image exposed to Open Graph.
The title of your post is used to create the URL. If you want to use different keywords in the URL enter it below.
The following questions were similar. Do they answer your question?
博客 - 创建/编辑文章
在标题中显示论坛链接
超过建议的长度的字符数。为获得最佳结果，应缩短字符长度。
选择要引用的文本时，只能选择原始文章中的文本。请更正或移除您选择的文本。
此字段是必需的，并且引用块必须匹配。
{0} 在 {1} 撰写了下面的文章:
尝试保存此文章时出错。
有人回复此文章时通知我
是否确定要删除此文章?
您的草稿已保存。要在稍后编辑或发布草稿，请管理博客并在文章列表中找到此文章。
创建或查找现有问题话题
论坛 - 创建/编辑文章
与此内容唯一相关的逗号分隔词语列表。这些内容可供搜索引擎用于改进搜索结果。
在引用此内容时，调整搜索引擎使用的标题。如果未设置，则将使用博客文章的名称。为获得最佳结果，自定义标题将为 55 个字符或更少。
在 {0} 中提问或开始讨论
将此条目发布到我的其他博客
有人评论此文章时通知我
在列表或 RSS 源中显示文章时使用文章摘要。此外，将向搜索引擎和 Facebook 公开此摘要。为获得最佳结果，自定义摘要应为 155 个字符或更少。
此图像将用作博客文章列表视图中的缩略图，并用作向开发图形公开的图像。
文章的标题用于创建 URL。如果要在 URL 中使用不同关键字，请在下面输入。
下面的问题类似。您对这些答案满意吗?
建立或編輯部落格貼文。
部落格 - 建立/編輯貼文
在標題中顯示論壇連結
字元數超過建議的長度。請將期縮短以取得最佳結果。
選取要引用的文字時，只能選取來自原始貼文的文字。請更正或移除您的文字選取範圍。
此欄位為必填且引用區塊必須相符。
{0} 已於 {1} 撰寫下列貼文:
嘗試儲存這則貼文時發生錯誤。
有人回覆此貼文時通知我
您確定要刪除這%E5%89%87貼文嗎?
已儲存您的草稿。若要稍後編輯或發佈，請管理部落格並在貼文清單中尋找貼文。
建立或尋找現有的問題對話
論壇 - 建立/編輯貼文
與此內容唯一相關的字詞逗號分隔清單。搜尋引擎會使用這些字詞改善搜尋結果。
當參照此內容時調整搜尋引擎使用的標題。如果沒有設定，就會使用部落格貼文的名稱。為了取得最佳結果，自訂標題的長度不可超過 55 個字元。
在 {0} 問問題或開始討論
在我的其他部落格上張貼此項目
有人在此貼文中留言時通知我
在清單或 RSS 摘要中顯示貼文時會使用貼文摘要。此外，此摘要也會公開至搜尋引擎和 Facebook。為了取得最佳結果，自訂摘要的長度不可超過 155 個字元。
此影像將做為部落格貼文清單檢視中的縮圖以及公開至開放式圖形的影像。
您的貼文標題會用來建立 URL。如果您想要在 URL 中使用不同的關鍵字，請在下面輸入。
以下是相似的問題。他們否回答了您的問題?
